On 2/28/11 10:20 AM, y195322 wrote:
> Hi!We are doing web crawling using Heritrix, and found one issue in that once a link has been 'discovered,' it won't be 'rediscovered.'  This means that if we have something like:
>   aol.com->aolhealth.com
>   aolhealth.com->drugchecker.aolhealth.com
>
> and if drugchecker.aolhealth.com links to aol.com, that link will not show up in the file.
>
> Is there any way to fix this problem? Thanks!

Usually a single snapshot crawl only wants to retrieve each URL once, so 
this is by-design, rather than a problem.

Why do you want to fetch aol.com twice in a single crawl? (Or am I 
misunderstanding?)

- Gordon @ IA
